Title: Nigeria LNG exports poised to recover in March after pipeline sabotage in February
Description: LNG exports from Nigeria’s 22.2 mtpa Bonny Island plant are set to rebound in March following sabotage on feed gas pipelines that forced four of six liquefaction trains offline in February.
Author: CK

Title: Unplanned outage at South Korea’s Shin-Hanul No. 2 reactor could spur LNG demand if extended
Description: The recent unplanned shutdown of South Korea’s 1.4 GW Shin-Hanul No. 2 reactor has removed power generation capacity temporarily and could encourage additional spot LNG demand to compensate for the loss especially if the reactor faces an extended outage.
Author: CK
